name: Dzenaria
body:
# The responsibility
## The responsibility of the author
The author is not responsible for failures and use the software for personal gain.

This software was created for fun, when the author studied the mechanism to connect third-party application in the project and the impact on him.

The author is not responsible for the quality of translation into English, because he taught German at school. Blame It "Google Translayte." XD

## Personal responsibility
Using this software you will take full responsibility for broken software and hardware for themselves.

By using this software in a multiplayer game (yes, all manipulations are working and there ^_^), you run the risk of being banned if breaking the rules of the server.

Also, you can break the laws of your country and you will have to answer before the law.

***
[DOWNLOAD](https://github.com/DzenDyn/Dzenaria/blob/master/Dzenaria/bin/x86/Release/Dzenaria.exe?raw=true) latest nightly release.
***

# Features
1. Ghost (Invulnerability)
2. Heal
3. Mana infusion
4. Aqualung (Breathing under water)
5. Teleport function
6. Gold coins

***

# How to use Dzenaria
## Startup
Copy Dzenaria.exe to game folder near Terraria.exe. It's works with all version of Terraria(Steam/no Steam).

##Controls
* F1 — Save location for teleportation
* F2 — Teleport
* F3 — Add 100 gold coins
* Num1 — Heal toggle (First press activate function, second deactivate)
* Num2 — Mana Infusion toggle (First press activate function, second deactivate)
* Num3 — Aqualung toggle (Breathing under water, First press activate function, second deactivate)

***

# Plans
1. GPS (navigate to good blocks)
2. Coins
3. Good items
4. ~~Meteorite spam~~ 

---Unfortunately, to realize the function of changing the world is not possible without modifying the code of the game.

---This is the only place that the developers decided to award normal access modifier:

```c#
internal class WorldGen
 {
```

---Perhaps in the future, I'll change it and lay out a modified Terraria.exe

5. Complete this page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
